content.rendered: To show our appreciation for those you refer to us, we will send you a referral bonus. For each person you recommend to us that remains on our payroll for 90 days we will send you a gift card to a Tulsa restaurant.  Please send referral resumes to rachel@trinityemployment.com or call our office at 918-622-2588. Don’t forget to state that you referred them to Trinity! Bridge Careers Travel Agencies – Refer a Friend
